attributes.action: Help Fourth Generation of Kashmir by gaining them Right of Self Determination.
attributes.additional_details:
Please carry out independent investigations in Kashmir to analyse the real situation.
Let us help by stopping the Human Rights Violations in Kashmir.
Let us put pressure on India and Pakistan to give right of self determination to Kashmiri People.
Please Let us play our role, and request United Nations to implement the Plebiscite in Kashmir?
attributes.background:
India and Pakistan fought Three Wars on Kashmir Issue.
Since 1948, Kashmir Issue is in the United Nations. Three Generations waited for the resolution of this issue for over 65 Years, and now it’s Fourth Generation suffering in Kashmir.
Kashmir is in the state of Curfew / War since July 2016.

rejection.details: You could start a new petition calling on the UK Government to raise the issue of Kashmiri self-determination with the governments of India and Pakistan.
